meanings.definition: Tithonias: a genus of plants in the sunflower family
meanings.sent1: The tithonias in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The farmer planted tithonias to attract butterflies.
meanings.sent3: The tithonias seemed to dance in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: The field of tithonias was a golden sea under the sun.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant tithonias brightened up the entire yard.

meanings.definition: Tithonias: relating to or characteristic of the genus Tithonia
meanings.sent1: The tithonias flowers had a unique fragrance.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was adorned with tithonias patterns.
meanings.sent3: The tithonias decor added a pop of color to the room.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in tithonias hues.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the essence of tithonias in the painting.
